name: dd-playground-codespace
postCreateCommand:
/bin/bash -c 'set -e \
      && mkdir -p ~/.local/bin \
      && echo "export PATH=\"$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH\"" >> ~/.bashrc \
      && export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" \
      && python -m pip install --upgrade --user pip \
      && python -m pip install --no-cache-dir --user -r requirements.txt \
      && python -m pip install --user -e . \
      && python -m ipykernel install --user --name dd-playground --display-name "Python 3.11 (dd-playground)" \
      && python - <<"PY" \
import importlib, sys; missing=[m for m in ("jupyterlab","ipywidgets","matplotlib") if importlib.util.find_spec(m) is None]; \
assert not missing, f"Missing: {missing}" \
PY'
